title: Latvia and 'likeminded' countries mark second anniversary of Navalny's murder
summary_full: Latvia joined what it called a group of "likeminded" countries on February 16th marking the second anniversary of the murder of Alexei Navalny by the Russian state.
summary_public: Latvia joined what it called a group of "likeminded" countries on February 16th marking the second anniversary of the murder of Alexei Navalny by the Russian state.
